00213 template <class Element, int Dimensions>
00214 inline const Element& TArray<Element, Dimensions>::GetAt(const IndexType& index) const
00215 {
00216        I_ASSERT(index.IsInside(m_sizes));
00217 
00218        int elementIndex = GetElementIndex(index);
00219        I_ASSERT(elementIndex < int(m_elements.size()));
00220 
00221        return m_elements[elementIndex];
00222 }

00282 // inline protected methods
00283 
00284 template <class Element, int Dimensions>
00285 inline int TArray<Element, Dimensions>::GetElementIndex(const IndexType& index) const
00286 {
00287        int elementIndex = 0;
00288        int cumulatedSizes = 1;
00289        for (int i = 0; i < Dimensions; ++i){
00290               I_ASSERT(index[i] >= 0);
00291               I_ASSERT(index[i] < m_sizes[i]);
00292 
00293               elementIndex += index[i] * cumulatedSizes;
00294 
00295               cumulatedSizes *= m_sizes[i];
00296        }
00297 
00298        return elementIndex;
00299 }

00304 template <class Element, int Dimensions>
00305 TArray<Element, Dimensions>::TArray()
00306 {
00307        for (int i = 0; i < Dimensions; ++i){
00308               m_sizes[i] = 0;
00309        }
00310 }

00352 template <class Element, int Dimensions>
00353 void TArray<Element, Dimensions>::UpdateElementsSize()
00354 {
00355        int cumulatedSizes = 1;
00356        for (int i = 0; i < Dimensions; ++i){
00357               cumulatedSizes *= m_sizes[i];
00358        }
00359 
00360        m_elements.resize(cumulatedSizes);
00361 }

00363 
00364 template <class Element, int Dimensions>
00365 void TArray<Element, Dimensions>::DeepCopy(const Elements& elements, const SizesType& sizes)
00366 {
00367        I_ASSERT(int(elements.size()) == sizes[0] * sizes[1]);
00368 
00369        m_elements = elements;
00370        m_sizes = sizes;
00371 }

00389 template <class Element, int Dimensions>

00391 {

00393        I_ASSERT(IsInside(m_arrayPtr->GetSizes()));
00394 
00395        return m_arrayPtr->GetAt(*this);

00429 template <class Element, int Dimensions>
00430 typename TArray<Element, Dimensions>::Iterator& TArray<Element, Dimensions>::Iterator::operator++()
00431 {
00432        if ((m_arrayPtr != NULL) && !Increase(m_arrayPtr->GetSizes())){
00433               m_arrayPtr = NULL;
00434        }
00435 
00436        return *this;
00437 }

00456        if ((m_arrayPtr != NULL) && !Decrease(m_arrayPtr->GetSizes())){
00457               m_arrayPtr = NULL;

00480        BaseClass::operator=(iterator);

00485 
00486 template <class Element, int Dimensions>
00487 bool TArray<Element, Dimensions>::Iterator::operator==(const Iterator& iterator) const
00488 {
00489        if ((m_arrayPtr != NULL) && (iterator.m_arrayPtr != NULL)){
00490               return (m_arrayPtr == iterator.m_arrayPtr) && (BaseClass::operator==(iterator));
00491        }
00492 
00493        return (m_arrayPtr == iterator.m_arrayPtr);
00494 }
00495

00499 {

00506 template <class Element, int Dimensions>
00507 TArray<Element, Dimensions>::Iterator::Iterator(TArray* arrayPtr)
00508 :      BaseClass(0), m_arrayPtr(arrayPtr)
00509 {
00510        if ((m_arrayPtr != NULL) && !IsInside(m_arrayPtr->GetSizes())){
00511               m_arrayPtr = NULL;   // if it is not inside of array set it directly to the end iterator state
00512        }
00513 }
